# Introduction {.unnumbered}

## Summary

This page represents an evolving thematic catalogue of Gregor Joseph Werner's works.

In assembling the catalogue, we consulted the following sources:

- @Czernin2020 – sources of Werner's works in Austria
- @Dopf1956 – masses
- @Harich1976 – oratorios
- @Mikusi2020 – sonatas
- @Muranyi1997 – works in the National Szechenyi Library
- @Petermayr2020 – instrumental works
- @WinklerKlement2013 – works in the Dommusikarchiv Eisenstadt
- @WinklerKlement2020 – masses and oratorios

See also @Moder1959 for general information.
